TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract SmartTagBase

summary.span: 在 Office Word 和 Excel 解决方案中定义智能标记的共享功能。

span.span: Defines shared functionality for smart tags in Office solutions for Word and Excel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 和的基接口。 is the base interface for and . 若要在 Word 或 Excel 的 Office 解决方案中创建智能标记, 请使用`Globals.Factory.CreateSmartTag`方法创建或对象。To create a smart tag in an Office solution for Word or Excel, use the `Globals.Factory.CreateSmartTag` method to create a or object. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage 此类型仅适用于 Excel 2007 和 Word 2007 的项目。This type is intended to be used only in projects for Excel 2007 and Word 2007. Word 2010 和 Excel 2010 中已弃用智能标记。Smart tags are deprecated in Excel 2010 and Word 2010. [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

Docs.summary: 获取或设置一个由智能标记公开的操作的数组。Gets or sets an array of actions that are exposed by the smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 一个由智能标记公开的操作的数组。

span.span: An array of actions that are exposed by the smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组的大小必须是预先确定的, 因为向智能标记动态添加操作会导致文档中的所有智能标记重新加载。The size of the array must be predetermined, because dynamically adding actions to the smart tag would cause all the smart tags in the document to reload. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 , 然后将一个操作添加到属性。The following code example creates a and then adds an action to the property. 此代码示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#2)]

exception.span: 在将智能标记添加到 中之后设置此属性。

span.span: This property is set after the smart tag was added to a .

Docs.summary: 获取智能标记的名称。Gets the name of the smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

span.span: The name of the smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 智能标记的名称显示在智能标记菜单的顶部。The name of the smart tag is displayed at the top of the smart tag menu. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件的处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用属性来显示智能标记的名称。The event handler uses the property to display the name of the smart tag. 此代码示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/CS/CustomSmartTag.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/VB/CustomSmartTag.vb#4)]

Docs.summary: 获取智能标记将识别的正则表达式的集合。Gets the collection of regular expressions that the smart tag will recognize. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 获取一个 ，它包含智能标记将识别的正则表达式。

span.span: Gets a that contains the regular expressions that the smart tag will recognize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可将正则表达式添加到智能标记将识别的正则表达式集。Use the method to add a regular expression to the set of regular expressions that the smart tag will recognize. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 , 然后使用属性将正则表达式 "[i|i I] ssue\s\d{5,6}" 添加到智能标记识别的正则表达式集合。The following code example creates a and then uses the property to add the regular expression "[I|i]ssue\s\d{5,6}" to the collection of regular expressions that the smart tag recognizes. 此代码示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(class System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex regex) cil managed

param.name: regex
param.span: 一个正则表达式，它定义要在文档中搜索的术语。

span.span: A regular expression that is used to define the term to be searched for in the document.

Docs.summary: 从智能标记中移除正则表达式识别器。Removes a regular expression recognizer from the smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.
获取充当智能标记唯一标识符的命名空间。Gets a namespace that acts as a unique identifier for the smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 充当智能标记唯一标识符的命名空间。

span.span: A namespace that acts as a unique identifier for the smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个智能标记类型都由命名空间定义, 使其标识是唯一的。Each smart tag type is defined by a namespace so that its identity is unique. 命名空间是一个 XML 构造, 用于唯一标识属于逻辑类别的一组 XML 标记。A namespace is an XML construct for uniquely identifying a group of XML tags that belong to a logical category. 命名空间将相关属性组合在一起, 以便于属性发现, 更重要的是使属性名称保持唯一。A namespace groups related properties together for easy property discovery and, more importantly, to keep the property names unique. 属性名称是通过结合命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 和标记名称来构造的。Property names are constructed by combining the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and the tag name. 换言之, 属性名称由命名空间 URI 和命名空间 URI 的标记名称组成。In other words, property names are composed of a namespace URI and a tag name of the namespace URI. 同样, 智能标记类型由唯一的命名空间 URI 和标记名称定义。Similarly, smart tag types are defined by a unique namespace URI plus the tag name. 数字符号 (#) 追加到命名空间 URI, 并用于将命名空间 URI 与其标记名称分隔开。A number sign (#) is appended to the namespace URI and is used to separate the namespace URI from its tag name. 格式如下所示: namespaceURI # tagnameThe format is as follows: namespaceURI#tagname 智能标记类型的示例为 "urn: 架构-contoso-com: 财务 # StockTickerSymbol"。An example of a smart tag type is urn:schemas-contoso-com:finance#StockTickerSymbol. 此处, 命名空间 URI 为 urn: 架构-contoso-.com: 财经, 其中 StockTickerSymbol 作为标记名称。Here, the namespace URI is urn:schemas-contoso-com:finance, with StockTickerSymbol as the tag name. 它们组合在一起形成属性的完全限定名称, 在本例中为智能标记类型。They are combined to form a fully qualified name of the property, which in this case is a smart tag type. 智能标记类型是 XML 标记的完全限定说明。A smart tag type is a fully qualified description of an XML tag. 因此, 除了命名空间, 每个智能标记类型都由其标记名称唯一标识。Therefore, every smart tag type is uniquely identified by its tag name in addition to its namespace. 属性名称的 URI 部分确保它是唯一的且明确的。The URI portion of the property name ensures that it is unique and unambiguous. 可以使用命名空间来区分具有相同标记名称的两个属性。Two properties with the same tag name can be differentiated using namespaces. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件的处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用属性来显示智能标记的唯一命名空间标识符。The event handler uses the property to display the unique namespace identifier of the smart tag. 此代码示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/CS/CustomSmartTag.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/VB/CustomSmartTag.vb#4)]

Docs.summary: 获取智能标记将识别的字符串的集合。Gets the collection of string literals that the smart tag will recognize. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 获取一个 ，它包含智能标记将识别的字符串。

span.span: Gets a that contains the string literals that the smart tag will recognize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可将字符串文本添加到智能标记将识别的字词集。Use the method to add a string literal to the set of terms that the smart tag will recognize. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 , 然后使用属性将单词 "`sale`" 添加到智能标记识别的字词的集合中。The following code example creates a and then uses the property to add the word "`sale`" to the collection of terms that the smart tag recognizes. 此代码示例是为提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#2)]
